The Golden Years: Way Out West
The Golden Years: Way Out West

name: The Golden Years: Way Out West
summary: Make your home out on the range with The Golden Years - Way Out West, an epic endeavor from the creators of Hotel Mogul. Life is simple for a wife and her husband back in the Old West, until their first child arrives, then things suddenly change. A no-good baron imprisons the husband. Now, the poor wife and her son must work to make ends meet and turn the tables to free her husband.
